Archer: Attacks all enemies that are within range
Has no special properties, but costs low mana
Attacks in all cardinal directions (up, down, left, right)
High health and attack power, but moves slowly
Target ally gains +1 damage for 2 turns
When moving, advances to the nearest enemy in his row
ADJ. ALLY SPAWN: +1 Power For Zealot
SPAWN: +1 Mana For Commander Per Adj. Ally
